Description:
Detects the use of NPPSpy hacktool that stores cleartext passwords of users that logged in to a local file

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - NPPSpy Hacktool Usage
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (filepath like '%\nppspy.txt' or filepath like '%\nppspy.dll')
